name: Aldrein Series: The Fall Of Melonia
name_original: Aldrein Series: The Fall Of Melonia
description:
The kingdom has fallen... LONG LIVE THE REPUBLIC!

In the magical and cyberpunkish Kingdom Of Melonia, Mariana Aldrein is the future queen who has no idea on how to lead a country. But as she leaves the palace to forget her duties, a revolt breaks out and the kingdom fall. Now Mariana has a choice, alone in the cyberpunk city of Melonia, she can flee the city, or try to gather allies to take back the kingdom.

-------------------------

This game is in development, and has no rpg part at the moment. There is only the prologue available, developing the story of the main characters of the game. There is quite a sketch of what the rpg part could look like during this prologue.
